import React, { useState } from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faChevronUp } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import './TreeItem.scss' import TreeList from '../TreeList/TreeList' const TreeItem = ({ item, index, checked, setChecked, children, child, collapsed, toggleCollapse }) => { return (
Item {index} {item.name}
{children && }
) } export default TreeItem
